jobs.name: Back End Developer
Front End Developer
Sviluppatori Software
Sr MFE Architect
jobs.description:
**Job Specifications**

The MFE Architect  position plays a critical role on the Entando Engineering team, working directly with product owners to define requirements and design applications. The ideal candidate is proficient in front end technologies with a deep understanding of React/Angular, web architectures, UX design principles and practices, cloud environments, containers, use of microservices, agile and DevOps methodologies as well as familiarity with continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) practices. 

The candidate will lead a team to explore and design new ways to integrate and aggregate Micro Frontends in the context of a provisioning system based on DevOps and cloud computing principles.
The candidate should have strong people skills including the ability to communicate with both business and technical teams. The selected candidate must also be able to provide mentorship, coordination and support for peers.

**Level of Expertise**

A significant amount of experience (5+ years) in a Senior, Principal, or Lead role.

**Work area & Type of engagement**

Full time; residence somewhere in Sardinia is preferred; the organization of work can be discussed.
Note: This is an Architect role. The role requires the candidate to be absolutely hands-on.

**Requirements**
* 5+ years development or experience designing, developing and maintaining large scale web applications
* Experience with NodeJS
* Experience designing web application, mastering frontend technologies like JavaScript, CSS3 and HTML5, Bootstrap, React, AngularJS, jQuery
* Expert level in Webpack and npm package design
* Experience in Single-SPA meta-framework to combine multiple frameworks on the same page without refreshing the page such as React, Vue, Angular 1, Angular 2 etc.
* Experience in different approaches like Isolation of Micro-apps into Iframes+Event Bus/ Edge Side Includes (ESI) mixed with Client Side Includes (CSI)/ OpenComponents.
* Different modules to communicate over a shared events bus
* Using Component Libraries depending on the stack of the main app for different components and app sections.
* Usage of Web components as an integration layer - Custom Elements (Angular Elements, Stencil, Polymer or Nutmeg), Shadow DOM, HTML Imports, HTML Templates - completed with both logic and visual representation packed together
* Experience in aligning modularization with domains (Domain Driven Design)
* Advanced patterns in RESTful API like Versioning, Authorization, Uniform contract, Entity endpoints
* RESTFul Services API, Testing and Security
* RESTFul API Frameworks, Standard Languages and Toolkits - SpringBoot, Light4j, Spark, Dropwizard, Go
* Legacy Modernization to Microservices centric apps - Refactoring, Rewriting, Containers, Service extraction/ Composition/ Migration
* OO JavaScript and Front-end frameworks like Facade, Mediator, etc.
* Agile, CI, Containers, Docker, Kubernetes, etc.
* Familiarity with continuous integration and deployment concepts
* Very comfortable with distributed version control (Git and GitHub)
* Familiar with the Open Source lifecycle
* Team player, with the ability to train and mentor colleagues
* Fluent spoken and written English communication skills
* We’ll be especially impressed if you have:
* Experience working directly with clients in a services or consulting capacity
* Experience with React Native, Next.js, Storybook
* Experience with OpenShift

**Other information**

We value a healthy organization above all. The impact of our work is obvious, highly visible and immediate. We build a work environment where people are looking forward to Mondays as much as to Fridays. To put it simply: we get along with each other so we’re looking for a very collaborative person, no one-man band profile. Strong tech skills must be combined with a desire to own something big, from start to finish. Language agnostic. If you are interested in learning new things, we're interested in teaching you. 

**Here are some of our perks:**

Work remotely. Entando is committed to remote development.
Great work-life balance
Professional development, career development & career planning
High caliber, high quality team
Values-driven organization
Innovation sessions (where we welcome ALL employee ideas)
High impact, high visibility projects
Open source, upstream community development

jobs.description:
Oppotunità

Che cosa farai e che cosa ci aspettiamo da te:
* Sviluppo e implementazione della piattaforma salesforce.com e relative applicazioni
* Utilizzo delle metodologie di project management più avanzate (agile)

Responsabilità

l tuo ruolo sarà focalizzato sull’ esecuzione proattiva e responsabile di complesse attività progettuali, sul coordinamento di parte del team di progetto e sul supporto al Manager nella gestione del cliente. Avrai la responsabilità di condividere la tua esperienza e le tue conoscenze con i colleghi più giovani e di essere per loro un punto di riferimento nella realizzazione della nostra ambizione: “make an impact that matters

* Esperienza da 2 a 4 anni maturata in primarie Società di consulenza all’interno di progetti in ambito CRM presso prestigiosi clienti italiani o internazionali, in particolare nelle seguenti aree:
	* Configurazione di salesforce.com Configurazione e implementazione di Salesforce.com,
	* Sviluppo con codice nativo (APEX), e utilizzo dei linguaggi Javascript, Ajax e HTML
	* Metodologia di sviluppo applicativo (Agile, SCRUM).
	* Redazione di documenti di analisi funzionale e tecnica e di formalizzazione di concetti tecnici e funzionali in una presentazione powerpoint
	*  Conoscenza dell’architettura generale e degli ecosistemi di salesforce.com (es. CPQ solutions e Order Management solutions)
	* Modelli di sicurezza di Salesforce.com

Comprovata capacità di:

* Spiegare chiaramente come la tecnologia Salesforce possa indirizzare le sfide aziendali e l’impatto sulla Customer Experience
* Applicare le precedenti soluzioni di implementazione CRM e conoscenza del settore del cliente al fine di ritagliarvi soluzioni specifiche per il raggiungimento degli obiettivi di business
* Applicare best practice funzionali e tecniche ed utilizzo di comprovate metodologie (per esempio, Agile, EVD secondo metodologia Salesforce)
* Padroneggiare gli argomenti e guidare le figure junior a consegnare rispettando gli obiettivi del cliente
* Creare competenze di settore e applica metodologie certificate Deloitte Salesforce per indirizzare le sfide IT del cliente
* Costruire esperienze di sviluppo continuativo con linguaggi e prodotti IT comuni (Apex, VisualForce, Force.com or Java/J2EE)
* Essere aggiornato sulle novità relative prodotti e applicarle ai clienti
* Ottenere le certificazioni dal vendor su uno o più prodotti Salesforce ed applicare le conoscenze acquisite alla definizione ed allo sviluppo di soluzioni
* Sapere adattare ed indirizzare i cambiamenti nelle richieste ad ogni passaggio del processo di sviluppo; gestire la situazioni di ambiguità ed aiutare i membri del team a crescere in tale ambiente
* Mantenere un’attenzione continua all’eccellenza tecnica ed al dettaglio
* Mantenere contatti con i clienti durante lo sviluppo della soluzione e il ciclo di delivery
* Disponibilità ad operare in trasferta anche internazionale
* Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese scritta e parlata

jobs.name: Senior Full stack Developer
jobs.description:
KNOBS è una società di consulenza e sviluppo software specializzata in tecnologia Blockchain.
Siamo una realtà professionale, competente e appassionata. Lavoriamo su tecnologie avanzate e moderne per la realizzazione di sistemi classici (piattaforme software, applicazioni web e mobile) e di sistemi complessi ed innovativi, come quelli basati su blockchain.

🏠 COSA TROVERAI IN KNOBS
Siamo un gruppo di professionisti, che lavorano in un ambiente dinamico e in rapida espansione. Siamo sempre attenti e aperti all'utilizzo delle ultime tecnologie offerte dal mercato, e siamo sempre all'avanguardia grazie ad una costante attività di scouting e ricerca. Grazie a tutto ciò siamo specialisti nei servizi ICT e tra i principali esperti a livello italiano ed internazionale in ambito blockchain.

Il nostro team è oggi composto da figure professionali diverse, ma tra loro complementari: sviluppatori, designer, project manager ed esperti del marketing. Il cuore pulsante della nostra società è situato a Milano, ma abbiamo fatto dello smart working una vera e propria filosofia lavorativa, permettendo alle nostre risorse di connettersi dal luogo che preferiscono.

Basiamo la nostra cultura sulla trasparenza, il gioco di squadra, e la sincerità: non esistono domande off-limits. Non è nostra abitudine giudicare per un singolo errore ma per la performance totale. Siamo una squadra e come tale cerchiamo di mettere in campo i miglior giocatori per raggiungere i risultati ambiziosi che ci siamo posti.

👷 IL TUO RUOLO IN KNOBS
Ti occuperai dello sviluppo di applicazioni e sistemi informatici legati al mondo blockchain e non, sia lato frontend che lato backend.
Lavorerai  in team, per soddisfare le esigenze dei nostri clienti e raggiungere gli obiettivi prefissati.

La comunicazione è molto importante. Organizziamo allineamenti settimanali per tutto lo svolgimento del progetto: con il PM per identificare i principali task su cui lavorare, e con il responsabile tecnico per un confronto sugli aspetti riguardanti lo sviluppo.

Siamo un team flessibile e aperto al dialogo, attento però alla qualità e all'efficienza operativa: il nostro iter prevede, all'inizio di un task, la creazione di un  nuovo branch; e  l'apertura di una  merge request al termine dello sviluppo, che verrà accettata da uno dei responsabili tecnici con una code review. Cerchiamo di  non creare mai task che impieghino intere giornate di sviluppo: suddividiamo le feature più complesse in sub-task, il più possibile atomici e distribuiamo di conseguenza il lavoro tra le risorse coinvolte.

🚧 COSA CI ASPETTIAMO DA TE
Lato frontend ci aspettiamo  un'ottima conoscenza di Javascript con particolare focus a React, mentre lato backend ci aspettiamo una conoscenza avanzata di uno tra Rust, Golang o Python ed esperienza in generale su argomenti blockchain. Viene richiesto inoltre un utilizzo autonomo di Git come sistema di versioning.

Cosa intendiamo per ottima conoscenza? 
Leggi questo elenco: promise, useEffect, npm, hook, arrow function, destructuring, async functions, optional chaining, callback, scope, == vs ===, jsx, smart contract, web3, git, rebase, code review.

Ci sono più di 3 concetti che non sapresti spiegare a qualcuno? 
Allora forse non hai il livello di esperienza che stiamo cercando.

Ci aspettiamo una persona curiosa, appassionata e intraprendente che non lasci nulla al caso e che sia pronta ad approfondire i concetti che non ha chiari al 100%. Cerchiamo una persona che sappia lavorare in team e abbia come obiettivo  la realizzazione di  prodotti di alta qualità. Vogliamo una persona che sappia fare gioco di squadra,  capace di dare e accettare feedback e migliorare di conseguenza.

E' richiesto un buon livello di inglese e l'assoluta indipendenza nel leggere documentazione tecnica.

jobs.name: C# Senior Developer
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Senior Web Developer that will join the Imaging Development Team with the aim to take over its responsibility within 1 year.

The Imaging division designs innovative information systems of the highest quality and technology for the treatment and management of medical images that can support diagnostic and therapeutic activities in the most varied sectors of medical imaging.
The Clinical PACS of Tesi Imaging includes a complete suite of specific applications for different sectors of medicine that treat non-radiological medical images:
• Endoscopy (Gastroenterology, Pneumology, Otorhinolaryngology, Orthopedics, etc.)
• Ophthalmology
•Obstetrics and Gynecology
•Ultrasound
•Dermatology
•Surgery
• Genetics
• Pathological anatomy

Skills:
- Bachelor's/Master's Degree in Computer Science/Mathematics/Phisic
- Advanced knowledge of: HTML5, CSS, Javascript, Typescript, NodeJs, Angular 6+
- Experience with C# and .net
- English proficiency (spanish optional)

jobs.name: Senior Software Engineer - Java
jobs.description:
Klarna was founded in Stockholm, Sweden in 2005. Since then we've changed the banking industry forever. And now we're creating the world's smoothest shopping experience. We serve over 90 million consumers worldwide, and partner with 200,000 merchants – with a new merchant joining us every 8 minutes. Including some of the world's leading brands, such as H&M, ASOS, IKEA, Adidas, Samsung and Lufthansa. Our offices are spread over 17 different markets, hosted by 3500+ employees from 100 nationalities.

This is an excellent opportunity for Software Engineers to join our brand new office in our newly formed tech hub of Milan, Italy.

About Engineering at Klarna:
Engineering at Klarna is an inspired, customer focused community, dedicated to crafting solutions that redefine our industry. Working in small, highly collaborative Agile teams, you and your team will have a clear mission and ownership of an important outcome that supports Klarna and our customers. At Klarna we optimise for quality, flow, fast feedback, focusing on end-to-end ownership, continuous improvement, testing, monitoring, and experimentation. We aim for teams that are inclusive, helpful, and have a strong sense of ownership for the things they build. 

As a Klarnaut, you’ll contribute to the growth of Europe’s most highly valued fintech and your work will reach millions of users. Want to be part of the change? We're expanding several of of our engineering teams; teams working on our core checkout product, payment services and Klarna App to name a few.

What you’ll get to do:
* Own your services end to end. Decide how best to build, test, deploy and monitor.
* Be an integral part of a team, in addition to its culture and ways of working. Common practices include agile methodologies, pair and mob programming.
* Work with large scale, highly available and resilient modern financial systems.
* Take ownership on system design, collaborate with domain architects, own end-to-end problems, manage stakeholder communication, and mentor junior engineers
* Succeed, fail, and learn together with other talented people. We believe in an environment that provides an opportunity for growth and see education as an outcome of failure that gets us closer to the next breakthrough.
* Work with modern tools and languages that excite you.
* You will be the interface between business / customer using your product knowledge to make informed decisions.
* Take responsibility for end-to-end feature work; through planning, development, deployment, maintenance, and monitoring.
* Drive knowledge sharing through demos, presentations and tutorials.

Some of the technologies you will get to work with:
* Java (latest versions)
* Spring and Spring Boot and potentially other modules
* Other technologies include: Docker and Kubernetes, Kafka/SNS/SQS, PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch/ELK stack, Microservice architecture at scale on AWS*

*Even if you are not proficient in all of them, you should be open to learning and working with any of these technologies as the choices available may change over time.

To succeed in this role, we think you should have:
* Software development experience in Java
* Experienced working with modern frameworks
* Strong problem solving ability
* Growth mindset and bias for action
* Good communication skills in English

We understand some people might not feel they tick every box (ie coming from a non JS background). But if you're excited about the prospect of joining Klarna and believe you can add value, we'd still love to hear from you!

* Work with modern tools and languages that excite you.

Some of the technologies you will get to work with:
* Javascript
* React and React Native
* Redux
* Node.js, Express.js
* AWS, Splunk, Ansible, Terraform, Jenkins, Docker and Kubernetes*

* Even if you are not proficient in all of them, you should be open to learning and working with any of these technologies as the choices available may change over time.

To succeed in this role, we think you should have:
* Software development experience in JavaScript.
* Experienced working with modern frameworks.
* Strong problem solving ability.
* Growth mindset and bias for action.
* Good communication skills in English.

We understand some people might not feel they tick every box (ie coming from a non JS background). But if you're excited about the prospect of joining Klarna and believe you can add value, we'd still love to hear from you.

jobs.name: Fullstack Engineer
jobs.description:
WHAT'S THE ROLE ABOUT
The WebSpark team develops a ready-to-use web platform that provides a state of the art online presence for official car dealerships and independent multi-brand retailers and enables them to maximise traffic acquisition and lead generation at a lower cost-per-lead.

As a full stack developer on the team you will contribute to building new features for WebSpark and help scaling the platform. We are looking for individuals willing to help us raise our bar and improve our current architecture; code lovers who are experienced enough to know that for any given technical solution the execution is a key factor for success.


We’re constantly striving to be data driven. That means we measure everything that gives us insights we can use to continuously improve. We do that in a Lean way, using Kanban to represent our workflow while we’re using Scrum as an agile framework.

REQUIREMENTS

WHAT YOU SHOULD HAVE TO FIT THE ROLE
Experience in one or more frontend technologies such as AlpineJs/jQuery, Vanilla JS, SASS Tailwind, VueJS
Experience with packaging tools such as Webpack, Babel or Grunt.
Experience with Laravel, Docker and WordPress Bedrock are nice to have
Knowledge of unit and functional testing
Expertise of OOP in a PHP environment
Experience with third-parties systems integration
Familiar with continuous delivery and with the principles of “you build it, you run it”
Familiar with Agile principles and best practices such as peer review, pair programming
Clear understanding of fundamental computer science and software engineering concepts (e.g. design patterns)
Good spoken and written level of English is a must.


WHAT YOU WILL DO
Build new services and products that enhance our platform offering.
Build plug-ins and widgets on our WordPress Blackrock systems serving over 1400 websites and counting.
Ship maintainable, robust and tested code in production.
Collaborate with POs and other devs to deliver value incrementally but constantly.
Understand our business needs to make sure you’re addressing them properly.
Liaise with the QA Engineers to test the user stories.
Identify and implement the best architectural solutions collaborating with the architects.
Help improve our way of working based on continuous improvement

jobs.name: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description:
WHAT'S THE ROLE ABOUT
You will be part of a very strong, close-knit team developing top ending solutions for car makers, car dealers and leveraging the lead generation and sales in the automotive world.

As part of the DevOps team, you will investigate, architect and develop solutions that bring new functionality, increased stability, and enhanced scalability to our products.

You will be part of a dynamic team for the development of Software solutions with responsibility on all the software lifecycle.

Technical activities involves greenfield projects such as integrating and interact with APIs in a distributed architecture, plus existing software evolution.


WHAT YOU WILL DO
Give support to the software and applications platforms for the entire business
Develop systems infrastructure best practices, in order to increase the efficiency of software deployment
Perform SaaS operations and performance optimization
Perform capacity management and load testing
Build and manage automated cloud principles (AWS) while keeping quality of solution provided
Participate to processes and architectural decisions facilitating delivery into production.

REQUIREMENTS
WHAT YOU SHOULD HAVE TO FIT THE ROLE
Experience in Docker is a must
Direct experience with Kubernetes (or can demonstrate good attitude to learn) or similar such as OpenShift
Proven experience in Cloud services and open source technologies (AWS, Azure, GCP,...)
Experience in Enterprise Software would be a plus point
Strong background in Linux/Unix environments as Administrator
Experience in usage of automation/configuration management platforms (Ansible, CloudFormation, ...)
Knowledge of Continuous Integration Systems (Jenkins) and Continuous Delivery Systems concepts
Strong experience in databases (MySQL, Postgres, …)
Experience in the use of Git
A relevant knowledge of scripting-bash Programming: Bash, PHP, Groovy
Practical knowledge of networking; TCP/IP, VPC
Good knowledge of monitoring and log collection tools
Preferable experience with CMS (WordPress, Joomla, ...)
Microservices Architecture
Preferable experience in design and build logging, monitoring and alerting platforms

jobs.name: QA Engineer
jobs.description:
We are looking for a QA Engineer to join our R&D team to contribute to a blended role of test automation and manual testing. You will be working within a cross functional team of developers and product managers on a range of different SaaS enterprise solutions and tools.

RESPONSIBILITIES
Being an advocate of quality and owning the QA process in the sprint to maintain the quality of our platform and timely software releases.

Ensure reliable, scalable and software fit for purpose is delivered.
Develop and extend our automation test packs in order to reduce manual testing
Propose tools and processes to improve effectiveness of the team, and lower the risk associated with delivery of the software
Communicate effectively with Developers, Product, QA and Support team
Work with engineers and support to troubleshoot/triage issues found during testing and in production
Able to work in a fast-paced environment with an ability to shift priorities and focus with changing requirements and market demands
Comfortable and effective at working in a remote capacity, collaborating with team members across different locations through digital channels
Take ownership of testing activities in the sprint / project
Write effective bug reports and test reports with all the required information and root cause analysis where possible and tracking the ticket until closure
Develop a solid understanding of our products, data flow & architecture
Consolidate and surface areas of concern in a clear, concise and solutions-focused manner

REQUIREMENTS
WHAT WE NEED FROM YOU?
As a QA Engineer, we would expect you to have previous experience in quality assurance processes and methodologies.

Experience being part of a cross-functional team, using agile methodologies.
Excellent communication skills and ability to work effectively
Experience in the design of test coverage identifying gaps in test coverage and use appropriate tooling to eliminate the gaps
Creation, execution and maintenance of manual and automated tests
Experience with automated frameworks such as WebdriverIO, Cypress, RestAssured or Java / Selenium based automation.
Solid understanding of best practices such as TDD, BDD, CI/CD and the Practical Test Pyramid
Good understanding of CI/CD methodology and tools such as Jenkins
Experience of working with various QA tools inclusive of defect tracking systems, Test management tools and Cloud based platforms such as Browserstack, SauceLabs
Basic knowledge of SQL is essential
Experience working for a product centric organisation ( desirable)
Website /e-commerce testing experience (desirable)

jobs.name: Node JS Developer
jobs.description:
Founded in 2011, Facile.it is today the leading Italian comparison service for insurance, financial services, utilities and internet providers. Every month it helps more than 3.000.000 users compare the best offers and save money, for example when choosing the most convenient car insurance company.

Since May 2018, Facile.it is supported by the international fund EQT, an investment company with 50 billion capital, which acquired the control of the group.

Facile.it is an innovative and fast-growing web company. Moreover, since May 2018 we have joined with EQT, an international fund with over €50 billion in assets under management. In recent years we have achieved a year-on-year average turnover growth of 20%, generating revenues of €120 million in 2020.
To reach our goals, during these years, we have invested on the offline marketplace.
Firstly we invested on the b2b offline channel. The second step was the retail/b2c offline channel; in 2017 we opened our first store in Varese and today we have more than 30 stores distributed throughout Italy. Then in 2018, Facile.it acquired a credit brokerage network.
Today Facile.it is an internet company with over 1000 people distribuited in the HQ in the heart of Milan, and three other offices in Cagliari, Catania and Tirana.

**POSITION**

Facile.it is a web company that have built a digital platform completely in-house, capable of supporting all the Company's business processes.
For our IT team we are looking for a back-end developer who wants to take part in innovative projects with a wide impact in one of the most relevant digital realities in Italy.
The candidate will develop applications in Node.js and Typescript technology, working with cross-functional teams in a young, dynamic and innovation-oriented context.

**KEY RESPONSIBILITIES**
 * You will work on client-side backend projects with high visibility and high traffic 
* You will collaborate to the creation of containerized micro-services, scalable on distributed architectures (Kubernetes) to integrate and partially replace existing PHP systems 
* You will work within one of the cross functional teams of Facile.it with a personalized growth plan 
* You will be part of a leading, young and fast-growing company, facing complex and ever new cHallenges. 

**REQUIREMENTS**
* You have at least 3 years of experience in software development.
* You have a very good knowledge of the Node.js runtime system
* You know software design and its principles and patterns
* You have experience in the creation of REST APIs and in the definition of OpenAPI specifications
* You have experience in the creation of micro-services in NodeJS
* You have a good knowledge of at least one of MySQL and MongoDB and have experience with oTher databases or storage systems (e.g. Redis, Memcached)
* You have experience with automated tests

**COMPLETE YOUR PROFILE**
*  A good knowledge of Typescript
* The ability to manage applications in a Kubernetes environment
* Familiarity with the fundamentals of functional programming
* Familiarity with reactive programming (RxJS)

**WHAT WE OFFER?**

* Employment on a permanent basis with remuneration commensurate with experience and a supplementary health fund 
* A young and dynamic IT team with an open mind towards new technologies and processes 
* Personalized insertion and growth plans
* Smart Working 4 days/week or full remote working
* 1 Friday per month dedicated to sharing and studying with the team 
* Library of technology books with more than 100 titles 
* Participation in technology events 
* The chance to do the job you love in a successful Italian company with an excellent team by your side 

You can find out more about us through our blog [https://engineering.facile.it](https://engineering.facile.it)

jobs.name: Backend Developer
jobs.description:
Are you a Backend Developer with prior experience looking for a new challenge? Then this opportunity at an exciting intelligent automation company could be the role for you!

At Altilia, our mission is to put AI in the hands of end-users to augment humans and help people process complex documents and data quickly, securely, and accurately to efficiently automate operational and decision-making processes by sophisticated and ethical AI tools to benefit workers, enterprises, environment, and the ultimately the society.
Our no-code intelligent process automation software products help organisations to improve revenues and margins by enabling them to automate manual, data-driven, labor-intensive, document-based workflows. We adopt an augmented intelligence approach grounded on reinforcement and transfer learning, which allow business users and subject matter experts to train machine learning models by few examples with orders of magnitude less data than required by traditional techniques.

To extend our teams we are looking for motivated candidates who already have at least 1 year of experience as Backend Developer and aim at building a strong profile in this area. Previous teamwork activity in the field is necessary.


**Your Role and Responsibilities**

* As Backend Developer you will be responsible for modeling, developing, and maintaining applications and services, in particular:
* Managing the design and development of new applications and services.
* Developing unit, integration and functional testing.
* Produce clean and efficient code based on specifications
* Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade existing software
* Recommend and execute improvements
 

**Skills and Qualifications**

* Master's Degree in Computer Engineering or Computer Science
* Computer science fundamentals in data structures, algorithms, object-oriented programming and MVC architecture. 
* Strong experience with programming languages such as Java, Python and shell scripting.
* Experience in developing applications on containers, micro-services, API orchestration with their eventual deployment on cloud.
* Knowledge of CI/CD tools
* Experience with agile teams and/or Knowledge of agile methods.
 

**The following will be considered a plus:**

* Experience with cloud environments and tools (Azure, AWS, and GCP).
* Experience working with the core Spring Framework and Spring Boot
* Experience working with Flask Framework
* Knowledge of container orchestration systems (e.g. Kubernetes)

jobs.name: Data Engineer
jobs.description:
Are you a Data Engineer with prior experience looking for a new challenge? Then this opportunity at an exciting intelligent automation company could be the role for you!

At Altilia, our mission is to put AI in the hands of end-users to augment humans and help people process complex documents and data quickly, securely, and accurately to efficiently automate operational and decision-making processes by sophisticated and ethical AI tools to benefit workers, enterprises, environment, and the ultimately the society.

We adopt an augmented intelligence approach grounded on reinforcement and transfer learning, which allow business users and subject matter experts to train machine learning models by few examples with orders of magnitude less data than required by traditional techniques.
To extend our teams we are looking for motivated candidates who already have at least 1 year of experience as Data Engineer and aim at building a strong profile in this area. Previous teamwork activity in the field is necessary.
The ideal candidate holds a degree in Computer Engineering or Computer Science.


**Your Role and Responsibilities**

As Data Engineer you will be responsible for modeling, developing, and maintaining applications and services, in particular:
* Work on the development, usage, maintaining, and monitoring of tools, solutions, and processes for collecting, processing, storing, and analyzing huge sets of data.
* Analyze complex data from various sources to build next-generation Data Processing systems and applications considering computational and data quality aspects.
* Implementing data transformations on raw data to provide relevant business information.
* Work as a part of Agile international remote teams to ensure smooth delivery.


**Skills and Qualifications**

* Knowledge of Java/Scala or Python.
* Experience with Spark.
* Knowledge of CI/CD
* Experience with agile teams and/or Knowledge of agile methods.
* Good Knowledge of English.


The following will be considered a plus:

* Experience with AWS cloud services (e.g. S3, EC2, EMR, Lambda, Redshift, etc.)
* Experience with Azure cloud services (e.g. Azure Databricks, AKS, Data Factory, Azure functions, Azure DevOps, etc.)
* Experience with IAC tools (e.g.Terraform)

jobs.description:

At Altilia, our mission is to put AI in the hands of end-users to augment humans and help people process complex documents and data quickly, securely, and accurately to efficiently automate operational and decision-making processes by sophisticated and ethical AI tools to benefit workers, enterprises, environment, and the ultimately the society.

* Computer science fundamentals in data structures, algorithms, object-oriented programming
* Deep knowledge of programming languages such as Java, Python, and shell scripts.

* Understanding and working experience of SQL, NoSQL, document store or graph databases

* Knowledge of DevOps and MLOps tools and principles

**The following will be considered a plus**

* Basic experience in training deep learning models.

jobs.name: .NET Developer
jobs.description:
Comp.Sys Srl, opera da oltre 25 anni nel mercato dei Servizi di Information Technology.
Lavoriamo con primarie realtà nazionali che consentono ai nostri collaboratori di acquisire significative esperienze in contesti strutturati, dinamici ed incentrati all’innovazione oltre ad essere sempre coinvolti in processi di condivisione delle conoscenze e formazione continua su nuove metodologie e tecnologie.

Per la Divisione di Application Operation stiamo ricercando un .Net Developer da inserire su progetti nei settori: Sanità, Infrastrutture e Trasporti.
Il ruolo richiede una spiccata propensione al lavoro in team, attitudine al problem solving, capacità organizzative e determinazione nel raggiungimento degli obiettivi, con la possibilità di seguire l’attività anche da remoto.

Requisiti:
* Laurea o diploma in discipline tecniche
* Buona conoscenza del .Net Framework 4.6 o superiore
* Conoscenza di .Net Core e Asp.Net Core
* Conoscenza di Entity Framework
* Conoscenza di Git e/o Microsoft DevOps

Costituisce titolo preferenziale la conoscenza di:
* Design patterns (es. MVC, DI)
* TSQL e connessione ai database relazionali
* DB MySQL
* Metodologia Agile
* DevOps e CI/CD

Grazie all'erogazione dei nostri servizi in società primarie nazionali, il candidato selezionato acquisirà significative esperienze in contesti strutturati, dinamici ed incentrati sull’innovazione. Inoltre, sarà sempre coinvolto in processi di condivisione delle conoscenze e formazione continua su nuove metodologie e tecnologie.
Al candidato selezionato sarà offerto un inquadramento contrattuale basato sulle capacità ed esperienze pregresse.

jobs.name: Java Developer

jobs.description:
**Chi siamo**

Da oltre 20 anni Par-Tec opera come abilitatore tecnologico, supportando le aziende italiane nella realizzazione di servizi digitali moderni, efficienti e sicuri mediante la fornitura di soluzioni IT, servizi professionali e formazione di alto profilo.

Infrastruttura IT, cloud enablement, applicazioni verticali per il mercato finanziario, industria 4.0, advanced & predictive analytics, privacy compliance e formazione sono solo alcune delle aree governate dai nostri centri di competenza distribuiti tra Milano e Roma e le sedi di co-working di Pistoia e Pomezia.

Il Gruppo Par-Tec è una realtà che comprende 200 professionisti e, oltre alla capogruppo, include le aziende Swing, Fine Tuning - Consulenza Integrata, Lightstreamer e la startup Faberbee.

**Descrizione della posizione**

Progettazione e Implementazione di soluzioni mobile adottate dai principali gruppi bancari in Italia. Data la rilevanza dei progetti richiediamo una comprovata esperienza.

**Responsabilità:**
* Progettare, implementare e manutenere le applicazioni mobile native (Objective-C e Swift).
* Lavorare in un virtual team e collaborare attivamente con i tuoi colleghi per garantire risultati di alta qualità.

**Conoscenze richieste:**
* Linguaggio Swift 5.1 [XCode 12+].
* Linguaggio Objective-C.
* Pattern MVVM e MVC.
* Auto-layout.
* Interfacciamento con servizi remoti.
* Librerie di networking [AlamoFire].
* Sistemi di versionamento del codice [git, SVN].

**Competenze ricercate:**
* Esperienza da 2 a 6 anni nello sviluppo di applicazioni native iOS.
* Attitudine al problem solving, capacità di analisi e comprovata esperienza nel troubleshooting.
* Forti capacità organizzative.

**Costituirà titolo preferenziale:**
* Curriculum universitario (Laurea o Diploma).
* Certificazioni tecniche

**Perché dovresti candidarti?**
* Avrai l’ opportunità di lavorare su app bancarie che saranno usate da milioni di utenti
* Avrai la piena responsabilità nella gestione dei tuoi compiti
* Potrai avere un contratto di smart working
* Lavorerai in un team giovane e dinamico

Il presente annuncio è rivolto ad entrambi i sessi, ai sensi delle Leggi 903/77 e 125/91, e a persone di tutte le età e nazionalità, ai sensi dei D.Lgs. 215/03 e 216/03.

jobs.name: Senior Frontend Developer
jobs.description:
KNOBS è una società di consulenza e sviluppo software specializzata in tecnologia Blockchain. Siamo una realtà professionale, competente e appassionata. Lavoriamo su tecnologie avanzate e moderne per la realizzazione di sistemi classici (piattaforme software, applicazioni web e mobile) e di sistemi complessi ed innovativi, come quelli basati su blockchain.

🏠 COSA TROVERAI IN KNOBS
Siamo un gruppo di professionisti, che lavorano in un ambiente dinamico e in rapida espansione. Siamo sempre attenti e aperti all’utilizzo delle ultime tecnologie offerte dal mercato, e siamo sempre all'avanguardia grazie ad una costante attività di scouting e ricerca. Grazie a tutto ciò siamo specialisti nei servizi ICT e tra i principali esperti a livello italiano ed internazionale in ambito blockchain.

Il nostro team è oggi composto da figure professionali diverse, ma tra loro complementari: sviluppatori, designer, project manager ed esperti del marketing. Il cuore pulsante della nostra società è situato a Milano, ma abbiamo fatto dello smart working una vera e propria filosofia lavorativa, permettendo alle nostre risorse di connettersi dal luogo che preferiscono.

Basiamo la nostra cultura sulla trasparenza, il gioco di squadra, e la sincerità: non esistono domande off-limits. Non è nostra abitudine giudicare per un singolo errore ma per la performance totale. Siamo una squadra e come tale cerchiamo di mettere in campo i miglior giocatori per raggiungere i risultati ambiziosi che ci siamo posti.

👷 IL TUO RUOLO IN KNOBS
Ti occuperai dello sviluppo di applicazioni web o mobile legate al mondo blockchain e non.
Lavorerai in team, per soddisfare le esigenze dei nostri clienti e raggiungere gli obiettivi prefissati.

La comunicazione è molto importante. Organizziamo allineamenti settimanali per tutto lo svolgimento del progetto: con il PM per identificare i principali task, e, con il responsabile tecnico per un confronto sugli aspetti riguardanti lo sviluppo.

Siamo un team flessibile e aperto al dialogo, attento però alla qualità e all'efficienza operativa: il nostro iter prevede, all'inizio di un task, la creazione di un nuovo branch; e l'apertura di una merge request al termine dello sviluppo, che verrà accettata da uno dei responsabili tecnici con una code review. Cerchiamo di non creare mai task che impieghino intere giornate di sviluppo: suddividiamo le feature più complesse in sub-task, il più possibile atomici e distribuiamo di conseguenza il lavoro tra le risorse coinvolte.

🚧 COSA CI ASPETTIAMO DA TE
Ci aspettiamo un'ottima conoscenza di Javascript con particolare focus su React, React Native e Git.

Cosa intendiamo per ottima conoscenza?
Leggi questo elenco: promise, useEffect, npm, appDelegate, hook, arrow function, destructuring, async functions, optional chaining, callback, scope, == vs ===, flexbox, jsx, useReducer, git, rebase, code review.

Ci sono più di 3 concetti che non sapresti spiegare a qualcuno?
Allora forse non hai il livello di esperienza che stiamo cercando.

Ci aspettiamo una persona curiosa, appassionata e intraprendente che non lasci nulla al caso e che sia pronta ad approfondire i concetti che non ha chiari al 100%.

Cerchiamo una persona che sappia lavorare in team e abbia come obiettivo la realizzazione di prodotti di alta qualità. Vogliamo una persona che sappia fare gioco di squadra, capace di dare e accettare feedback e migliorarsi professionalmente e personalmente.

E' richiesto un buon livello di inglese e l'assoluta indipendenza nel leggere la documentazione tecnica .

jobs.name: Technical Support Engineer
jobs.description:
Neptune Software is looking to hire 2 Technical Support Engineers, one in Norway and one in the EU. We are looking for an individual who can support our customers and partners in their journey with the Neptune DX Platform. 

As a Technical Support Engineer, this person will have a key role in maximizing the Neptune DX Platform value. In this role, they will help the Neptune Software community with their questions, guide partners, current customers and potential new customers in understanding the potential of Neptune DXP, and overcome any challenges they may have with our platform. We're looking for someone with superior technical expertise and a problem-solving aptitude for this position.

This person will be involved in implementation projects, proofs-of-concept, provide technical support and training for customers and partners to maximize Neptune DXP value. We’re looking for someone with superior technical expertise and a problem-solving aptitude.

This person must have a natural interest and curiosity to learn new technologies. They are comfortable working both independently and in teams. They are customer – and service oriented (i.e. people and consulting skills), keen on sharing knowledge and experience. We’re seeking a highly committed Microsoft Operations Engineer to help us to achieve this growth. Operating will include infrastructure monitoring, management, improvement and database administration, as detailed below. You will focus on Microsoft technologies like Windows Server, Internet Information Services, Microsoft SQL Server in complex configurations like failover clustering.

Your New Key Responsibility

* Infrastructure monitoring: you will monitor infrastructure’s availability, performance and resources, mainly with NAGIOS and Garfana;
* Infrastructure management: you will manage first-hand resources and their relocation and adjustment in accordance with systems load;
* Infrastructure improvement: you will be asked to analyze load and make load forecastings so to estimate infrastructure improvement needs;
* DEV Team support: you will support development teams in troubleshooting the service flow through the various infrastructure layers;
* DBA: you will have direct responsibility and management of the databases used by our TAX services, in terms of design, implementation and performance.

You may be a fit for this role if you have:

* Expertise in Microsoft Windows Server and Microsoft SQL Server technologies
* 1-3 years of experience in similar roles
* Motivated, committed, resilient to stress

You may be an even better fit for this role if you have:

* Microsoft Certified DevOps Engineer certification
* Bachelor’s degree/ Master Degree, preferably in computer science, electronic engineering

jobs.name: Solution Architect
Sistemista
jobs.location: Padova (PD) or San Donato Milanese (MI) or Mangone (CS)

jobs.name: IT Data Analyst
jobs.description:
Nell’area “IT & Data Management” di Cerved, i dati sono la nostra realtà quotidiana. Lavoriamo con uno spirito innovativo per identificare le soluzioni più adatte per i nostri clienti, con uno sguardo sempre aperto alle nuove tecnologie, all’innovazione e alle metodologie di implementazione.

All’interno del team di “Innovation and Data Sources” stiamo cercando un Data Analyst che avrà responsabilità in termini di:
* data governance, ovvero gestione e presidio relativamente al dominio dati di propria competenza
* data product ownership, ovvero:
* attività di analisi in iniziative/progetti per erogazione di “data products” (API, servizi di integrazione machine to machine, dashboard, …) in ambito Data Platform in Cloud, identificando soluzioni applicative attraverso il coinvolgimento delle diverse aree aziendali e delle terze parti interessate;
* supporto al team tecnico di Ingegneria del Software nella realizzazione, rilascio e monitoring delle soluzioni, tramite metodologia Agile

La persona che cerchiamo:
* è curiosa, appassionata di dati e di come gestire e utilizzare i dati stessi per generare valore al fine di aiutare le aziende a sviluppare e consolidare il proprio business;
* è pratica, flessibile, e si adopera a trovare soluzioni efficaci e creative in contesti complessi
* ha eccellenti capacità di comunicazione e presentazione con uno stile aperto, chiaro ed efficace per coinvolgere i vari interlocutori e stakeholder con diversi background;
* ha competenze in ambito API Platform, governance dati su infrastruttura in Cloud (AWS), database SQL (Oracle) e NoSQL (MongoDB, Hadoop)
* ha conoscenza dei principi di Data Management e Data Governance (framework DAMA, DGI, CMMI, ISACA)
* utilizza la metodologia di sviluppo Agile e ha una buona conoscenza dell’inglese

jobs.name: Big Data Engineer
jobs.location: Roma, RM (IT) | Lecce, LE (IT) | Smart working
jobs.description:
La figura avrà il compito di sviluppare, mantenere e valutare Big Data solution all’interno dell'aziende. Si occuperà quindi dell’aspetto architetturale del processo di analisi dati, a tale scopo deve essere esperto di data warehousing solution e saper lavorare a stretto contatto con il team di Data Expert. Il candidato deve essere in grado di comprendere le esigenze di progettazione e realizzare software in grado di soddisfarle, deve possedere una buona conoscenza dell'ingegneria del software e una vasta esperienza di programmazione e scripting. Il candidato deve avere esperienza nell’object-oriented design, nella gestione dei database system, delle tecnologie NoSQL e nella creazione di algoritmi ad alte prestazioni.

Conoscenze tecniche richieste:

* linguaggi di programmazione OO come Java
* linguaggi di scripting come Ruby, scala, Python e R
* conoscenza di differenti modelli e tecnologie NoSQL: key value store, document database, column family, graph database
* conoscenza di differenti framework di pipelining per l'interrogazione e la gestione efficace ed efficiente dei dati: pig, hive, kafka etc.
* conoscenza di ambienti e file system distribuiti come HDFS
* conoscenza del paradigma di programmazione MapReduce e del framework Hadoop MapReduce
* conoscenza e capacità di parallelizzazione di algoritmi onerosi al fine di aumentarne le prestazioni"

Conoscenze tecniche richieste:
* linguaggio Java e tecniche di Progettazione-Programmazione Object Oriented
* JSP (Java Server Page), Servlet
* framework MVC (almeno uno):
	*  Struts 1.2
	*  Struts 2.0
	* JSF (Java Server Faces)
	* Spring MVC
* container JEE (almeno uno):
	* Spring IOC container
	* EJB 2.1
	* EJB 3.0
* Framework di Object/Relational Mapping (almeno uno):
	* EJB 3.0 – JPA

jobs.name: Data Scientist /Machine Learning Engineer (MLE)
jobs.location: Roma, RM (IT) | Lecce, LE (IT) | Smart working
jobs.description:
Il candidato dovrà mostrare comprovata esperienza nel ruolo, e si occuperà in particolare di:

- analisi ed estrazione di informazioni da sorgenti dati strutturate, semi-strutturate e non strutturate
- implementazione, sviluppo e validazione di modelli di Machine Learning e Natural Language Processing
- conoscenza dei tipici casi d'uso in ambito AI e dei relativi modelli predittivi adottatti
- data handling, data visualisation, statistics e conseguente information extraction
- valutazione, verifica e presentazione dei risultati delle analisi

Requisiti tecnici richiesti:

- Conoscenza linguaggio R e delle librerie più diffuse come RWeka, doParallel, XGBoost, tidyr
- Conoscenza linguaggio python e delle librerie più diffuse come numpy, pandas, scipy
- Conoscenza avanzata delle basi di dati relazionali e del linguaggio di interrogazione SQL
- Conoscenza avanzata di machine learning e delle librerie più diffuse, come scikit-learn e statsmodel
- Conoscenza di framework Tensorflow o PyTorch per la relaizzazione di modelli di predizione e il loro addestramento
- Conoscenza di tecniche di computer vision e della libreria opencv

jobs.name: Senior Software Engineer - Frontend
jobs.location: Milan, Cagliari, London or completely remotely
jobs.description:
We’re a pan-European digital wealth manager with 55,000 active investors (growing fast!) and over £1.8 billion invested on our platform. With 130+ people across 3 offices in Italy and the UK, we’re supported and funded by Poste Italiane, Cabot Square Capital and Allianz.

We started in 2011 in Milan with a simple vision - to help more people improve their financial well-being by making personal investing straightforward and accessible through technology. Fast forward a few years, and we’re known as one of the most innovative fintechs headquartered in the heart of London.

**Role**

You’ll be joining our Consumer Applications group which consists of two teams which focus on increasing growth of our ambitious customer base, and making it easier and appealing for them to invest in our platform in order to grow their wealth.

You’ll research, create or evaluate proofs of concept and introduce new technologies to the team related to the Web frontend; You also appreciate other functional areas and their challenges in a product lead team.

You design and implement large size features which bring value while managing the system’s tech debt.

You instill trust and help others identify their potential, support and motivate individuals to realise it. Openly imparting your experiences to better others.

You constructively challenge the team processes and conventional views/current thinking to foster innovation, looking for ways to improve/optimise them.

You’ll make an impact on other teams influenced by our Frontend Chapter

You value simplicity and effectiveness.

**Responsibilities**

* Focussed on the public facing web apps and on our internal tools.
* Provides our customers a usable, simple and effective journey in terms of UX and UI.
* Collaborates closely with the mobile chapter to ensure consistency between our frontends.
* Advocates and produces a high standard of code quality and sees the value of a testing early culture.
* Drives and encourages the constant evolution of the frontend platform while constantly providing a unique and valuable customer experience.

**Requirements**

* You have at least 7 years of commercial experience in software engineering, a BSc in Software Engineering or Computer Science or higher degree non essential, but nice to have.
* Good understanding of the principles of software engineering: modularity, encapsulation, immutability, composition, FP and OOP.
* Deep knowledge of TypeScript, ES6, React, Redux, Jest, Node, HTTP, REST API.
* Familiar with the OpenAPI specification.
* Know vanilla CSS, responsive design and have experience with modern approaches to styling such as Styled Components.
* Good understanding of the principles of design, UI and user experience.
* Good understanding of agile methodologies, their principles and their ceremonies.
* Experience on JAMStack architecture with Gatsby or Next.js
* Experience with e2e testing frameworks like Cypress.
* Experience with CI/CD principles and GitlabCI.
* Experience in website performance optimization (Lighthouse).
* Have worked with and debugged HTTP requests using Nginx, HTTP authentication & headers.
* You know the basics of Docker.Appreciation or first hand experience of other coding languages namely Scala.
* Experience working in distributed teams.
* Able to communicate effectively in English (written and spoken), Italian is a nice to have.

jobs.name: Senior Software Engineer (Backend, Core Platform)
jobs.description:
We’re a pan-European digital wealth manager with 60,000 active investors (growing fast!) and over £1.8 billion on our platform. With 130+ people across 3 offices in Italy and the UK, we’re supported and funded by Poste Italiane, Cabot Square Capital and Allianz.

We started in 2011 in Milan with a simple vision - to help more people improve their financial well-being by making personal investing straightforward and accessible through technology. Fast forward a few years, and we’re known as one of the most innovative fintechs headquartered in the heart of London.

**Who we're looking for**

In this role you will be a Scala developer in a cross-functional development team. Your team will own a number of core product features such as our trading and billing systems. Likely technical challenges you will be facing in your first year at Moneyfarm will be related to adapting the architecture of our systems with strong customer growth in mind.

As a senior member you will provide guidance and support to your colleagues, helping with their technical and professional growth.

A successful candidate in this role will be pragmatic, value simplicity and effectiveness, and be biased for action. They will consider being wrong an opportunity for learning and will not consider any part of the software development lifecycle to be someone else's problem.

Your job title will be Senior Software Engineer, but your job will be to help us build a great product that our customers love, and a great environment to work in. We are looking for people who want to make an impact in whatever they can, contributing their ideas to how we can improve our product, our technology and the way we work.

**Responsibilities**

* Together with your team, you own the development, maintenance and non-functional aspects of some of Moneyfarm core systems. e.g. our trading and billing systems.
* Continually work to improve the way that your team works together.
* When needed, research and evaluate new approaches and technologies, and demonstrate their value.
* Mentor and support your more junior colleagues, using your experience to help them.
* Work closely with colleagues from around the wider engineering team to define and evolve our systems architecture.
* Own the production operation and non-functional aspects of the systems you create.
* Work closely with your team’s Engineering Lead and Product Manager to design upcoming projects for the team.

**Requirements**

* You have at least 5 years of commercial experience in software engineering. A BSc in Software Engineering or Computer Science or higher degree is non essential, but nice to have.
* A proven track record of delivering projects successfully.
* Scala commercial experience is highly preferred, but not essential provided you have strong transferable skills, e.g. Java 8+, Kotlin, functional programming, etc.
* Experience working with microservices architectures, event streaming systems and cloud providers is also preferred. Kafka, Kubernetes and AWS knowledge is a plus.
* A good understanding of agile methodologies (particularly Kanban/Lean), their principles and their ceremonies.
* Comfortable working in remote-friendly teams distributed between multiple locations.
* Experience in financial services or other regulated industries is preferred but not essential.
* Able to communicate effectively in English (written and spoken), Italian is a nice to have.

jobs.name: Microservices Architect
jobs.description:
Eustema is a Software Engineering and Consulting company operating in Italy since 1989 developing cutting-edge ICT solutions in order to create value and contribute to the modernization of the country. Eustema is looking for professionals who want to work on innovative projects and cutting-edge technologies, and people who share the company's strong focus on teamwork.

**Why Eustema**

The success that has accompanied our projects since 1989 is the result of a particular ecosystem developed by the company and based on: excellent skills of its team of professionals, continuous training and personalized growth paths, network of technological and commercial partnerships with the most important market players, synergy with the world of academic research and working flexibility thanks to our smart working agreement, in order to promote an adequate work-life balance.

Working on new key company projects, we are currently looking for a Microservices Architect

*You are the ideal candidate if:*
You have at least 5 years of experience in the implementation of Enterprise architectures within structured realities and have gained significant experience in the implementation of Cloud Native systems and / or in Application Modernization processes towards Cloud platforms.

**MANDATORY SKILLS:**

* Good knowledge of Microservices architectures
* Knowledge and experience in container technologies and related platforms (Docker, Docker Compose, Open Shift, Kubernetes, Anthos)
* Expertise in designing and developing Self-contained RESTful microservices with Java 8 (or higher) using Springboot / Spring Cloud Frameworks or .NET Core
* Knowledge and experience in Cloud DevOps, cloud automation and DevOps Toolchain (Gitlab and Jenkins)
* Agile development methodologies
* Knowledge and skills with caching systems (Redis)
* Knowledge and skills with queuing and message systems (Apache Kafka)
* Optional technical skills:
* Knowledge of Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS) and Infrastructure as Code (IaC) approaches
* Knowledge of the Serverless paradigm
* Knowledge of the main Paas services Amazon AWS, MS Azure and Google Cloud Platform
* Pattern Map / Reduce, Hdfs, Hadoop and Spark
* NoSQL DB (e.g., Mongo DB, GraphDB)

*The profile is completed by: *good communication and interpersonal skills, management and coordination skills of the technical team, customer orientation and problem solving, autonomy and operational flexibility.

Work site: Rome (Smart Working)

*The research is aimed at candidates of both sexes pursuant to Law 903/77.*

jobs.name: Full Stack Engineer Architect
jobs.description:
All’interno del team di Full-Stack Architecture sarai al centro della rivoluzione digitale, utilizzerai architetture e piattaforme Cloud per aiutare le più importanti aziende globali a trasformare velocemente le idee in applicazioni e servizi concreti. 
Avrai un accesso privilegiato e anticipato alle tecnologie di ultima generazione, grazie ad alleanze con i più importanti player del mercato digitale.

Le tue sfide
* Prenderai parte ad importanti progettualità di Cloud Modernization dove potrai apprendere ed utilizzare nuove metodologie di disegno applicativo, governance di sviluppo e fast prototyping.  
* Potrai mettere in gioco le tue competenze su diversi settori come: banche, assicurazioni, utilities, pubblica amministrazione, products e telco.

Anche in modalità Smart Working, con il tuo team contribuirai a:
* Potrai gestire il design di soluzioni applicative di nuova generazione sia greenfield che per la modernizzazione di applicativi esistenti
* Fornire un supporto all’implementazione di enterprise architecture basate su metodologie e pattern di ultima generazione: Microservices, Cloud native, Serverless, Event Driven, PaaS e Container-based.
* Ricoprire il ruolo di advisor tecnologico e, grazie alla capacità di acquisire velocemente skill tecniche, potrai migliorare il business dei nostri clienti
* Grazie al Network, ai nostri business partner tecnologici (AWS, GOOGLE, AZURE, RED HAT) e alle opportunità di training in Accenture potrai partecipare a corsi di formazione specifici e conseguire certificazioni riconosciute a livello internazionale.

Per distinguerti e affrontarle al meglio non possono mancarti le seguenti competenze:
* Una vera passione per l’innovazione e per le nuove tecnologie
* Da 3 a 5 anni di esperienza nel design ed implementazione di architetture applicative custom e della system integration. 
* Conoscenza dei design patterns applicativi ed architetturali, in particolare Microservice architecture,  API ed Integration patterns.
* Conoscenza e sensibilità delle tematiche di performance tuning & optimization
* Competenza ed esperienza su architetture basate su Java/J2EE e JavaScript e relativi framework.
* Conoscenza dei principali servizi e componenti cloud e delle tecnologie di Private Cloud/Container Orchestration
* Esperienza nella progettazione di soluzioni affidabili, resilienti e performanti in differenti technical use-cases
* Ottima conoscenza dell’Inglese

jobs.name: Business Consultant Commerce
jobs.description:
Le tue sfide:
* Consulterai e analizzerai con il cliente le esigenze di business per i sistemi informativi in ​​ambito e-commerce.
* Andrai a svolgere l’analisi, lo studio, la progettazione e la definizione di soluzioni e funzionalità di eCommerce
* Coordinerai le attività di un gruppo di lavoro per la progettazione funzionale/tecnica di soluzioni eCommerce sulle principali piattaforme presenti sul mercato
* Collaborerai con le più importanti aziende
* Lavorerai in modo creativo e analitico per la risoluzione dei problemi

Le sfide che affronti riflettono le tue ambizioni; questa è la tua occasione. Per distinguersi e affrontarli al meglio hai:
* Esperienza di lavoro su progetti IT e ampia esperienza nello sviluppo di software e prodotti
* Competenze sulle piattaforme di eCommerce: SAP Commerce (Hybris), Salesforce, Commerce Cloud, Magento, Shopify
* Buona conoscenza delle componenti della piattaforma ecommerce
* Conoscenza della metodologia Agile
* Hai maturato almeno dai due ai cinque anni di esperienza in ambito ecommerce
* Conoscenza fluente della lingua inglese
* Capacità di problem solving
* Preferibile esperienza con background consulenziale

jobs.name: Google Cloud Platform Apigee API Developer
jobs.description:
With Accenture’s Google Cloud Business Group, you will work with best in class technologies, to rapidly address the disruption our clients are going through by bringing together our global Accenture capabilities and Google’s disruptive technologies. 

Le tue responsabilità: 
* Responsabile dello sviluppo di API native del cloud, compresa la progettazione, la costruzione e il test sulla piattaforma di gestione delle API Apigee EDGE di Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
* Progettare e condurre applicazioni di ingegneria e sostenere i partner strategici nel processo di costruzione del software
* Risolvere i problemi con i sistemi e i servizi di produzione 
* Presentare status report ai clienti e ai principali stakeholder interni
* Contribuire a e/o guidare team e processi per raggiungere obiettivi strategici
* Avrai l'opportunità di imparare e lavorare con i Google Fellows e con i professionisti certificati di Google Cloud

I requisiti:
* Minimo 3 anni di esperienza di progettazione e sviluppo di applicazioni in un ambiente cloud, compresi 2+ anni di codifica di servizi REST e API come: Java, JSON, Python
* Minimo 1 anno di piattaforma Apigee EDGE di Google Cloud Platform ed esperienza di sviluppo API attraverso l'intero processo di sviluppo del ciclo di vita del software
* Minimo 1 anno di user interface e sviluppo di servizi web
* Esperienza di implementazione e consegna di almeno 1 soluzione client Apigee EDGE di Google Cloud Platform
* L'esperienza con openAPI 3.x è un plus
* Parli e scrivi inglese fluentemente
* Ami condividere e imparare cose diverse
* Ogni giorno è una nuova sfida per te e un'opportunità per imparare qualcosa di nuovo

jobs.name: Cyber Security Consultant - Identity and Access Management
jobs.description:
Farai parte di un team che aiuta le aziende a preparare, proteggere, rilevare, rispondere e recuperare in tutti i punti del ciclo di vita della sicurezza. Dovrai:
* Lavorare al fianco dei clienti per identificare e valutare le lacune e i requisiti di sicurezza per le loro applicazioni, sistemi, processi e organizzazioni
* Sviluppare ogni strategia e fase dell'architettura di gestione dell'identità e dell'accesso
* Utilizzare l'integrazione dei sistemi per implementare i nostri innovativi approcci legacy, Web 2.0 e Mobile e gestire la soluzione in ambienti complessi
* Gestire l'autenticazione RBAC

jobs.name: Senior Back End Developer
jobs.description:
Who we are:
You may not have heard of us, but you’ll know our brands! A.S. Watson is the world's largest international health and beauty retailer with over 16,000 stores in 27 markets. Each year, over 5.3 billion customers and members shop with our well-known retail brands, both online and offline, including the likes of Superdrug, Kruidvat, Watson’s, Marionnaud, The Perfume Shop, and many more. 

Based in Milan, eLab Technology is ASW Group digital Polo. It takes care of Omnichannel Strategy for European Brands of the group, delivering e-commerce, Mobile and in store Innovative solutions.
As a Senior Backend developer you will analyze complex topics, break them down, create technical solutions, write clean code and test it properly. You will also support the rest of the team with your experience, helping the junior on the day by day issues, as well as on the long term growth.

A typical day in this role includes:
* Design, plan, lead the development and document sets of complex stories 
* Writing clean code which follows best practice 
* Coaching and mentoring junior colleagues and performing code reviews 
* Understanding the whole system and guiding others
* Working closely with teammates, including international based colleagues
* Working with other teams to support all phases of software development
* Quickly analyzing and fixing issues on live environments when needed

This role would be a good fit for you if:
* You enjoy working on an multinational and multicultural environment, with several team sparse across the globe.
* You have developed a solid technical background in the eCommerce industry, and you love working on IT
* You know you add value through your communication and organizational skills
* You are good at team working and you are keen to help people grow 
* You are motivated by new challenges, working in a dynamic environment

What you’ll need:
* A degree in Information Technology or a related subject 
* 3 years’ experience working in IT 
* Hands-on experience in Java, Java EE and Spring Framework design & development 
* Working knowledge of integration technologies like REST, SOAP, JMS
* Working knowledge of web applications and related topics (e.g., HTTP, servlet containers, session management)
* Knowledge of Versioning Control Software (Git) 
* Knowledge and experience of SAP CX (aka Hybris) is a plus
* Knowledge of frontend technologies is a plus
* Knowledge of JVM internals and application performance improvement is a plus 
* To be a good communicator and team player in a multinational setting

What you’ll get from us:
•	Competitive salary, benefits and bonus scheme 
•	Excellent refer-a-friend scheme with up to 3000 euros up for grabs! 
•	A fantastic learning and development offering to explore 
•	Ticket Lunch
•	International and inclusive team based in Milan Fashion and design district
•	Lots of opportunities to get involved in wellbeing initiatives to support your physical and mental health + monthly CSR/Team events
•	…plus much More!

Each year, over 5.3 billion customers and members shop with our well-known retail brands, both online and offline, including the likes of Superdrug, Kruidvat, Watson’s, Marionnaud, The Perfume Shop, and many more. 

Based in Milan, eLab Technology is ASW Group digital Polo. It takes care of Omnichannel Strategy for European Brands of the group, delivering e-commerce, Mobile and in store Innovative solutions.
As a Senior Backend developer you will analyze complex topics, break them down, create technical solutions, write clean code and test it properly. You will also support the rest of the team with your experience, helping the junior on the day by day issues, as well as on the long term growth.

**A typical day in this role includes:**
* Design, plan, lead development and document sets of complex stories 
* Write clean code, with good code coverage and follow the best practices of the industry 
* Coach and mentor more junior colleagues and perform code reviews 
* Have an understanding of the whole system and take responsibility for teaching this to others 
* Work tightly with her/his team mates, also with those remotely located 
* Work with other teams to support all phases that precede and follow software development 
* Analyze, debug and fix issues on the live environments when needed 
* Find ways to improve system robustness, resilience and stability 


**This role would be a good fit for you if:**
* You enjoy working on an multinational and multicultural environment, with several team sparse across the globe.
* You have developed a solid technical background in the eCommerce industry, and you love working on IT
* You know you add value through your communication and organizational skills
* You are good at team working and you are keen to help people grow 
* You are motivated by new challenges, working in a dynamic environment


**What you’ll need:**
* A degree in Information Technology or a related subject 
* 3 years’ experience working in IT 
* Strong understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial-page updates, SSR and CCR and REST API 
* Proficient understanding of JavaScript client side frameworks (e.g. Angular, REACT, VueJs, WebComponents)
* Proficient understanding of State Management Tool (e.g. Redux, RxJS, NGRX)
* Strong knowledge of CSS pre-processing platforms, (e.g. LESS and SASS) 
* Strong knowledge of distributed version-control system 
* Understanding of Java server-side programming technologies (e.g. JSP) 
* Knowledge of Web design tools (e.g. Photoshop, Illustrator, XD) 
* Fluent English and Italian 
* Knowledge of Spartacus commerce cloud by SAP is a plus

**What you’ll get from us:**
* Competitive salary, benefits, clear career pathway and bonus scheme 
* Excellent refer-a-friend scheme with up to 3000 euros up for grabs! 
* A fantastic learning and development offering to explore 
* Ticket Lunch
* International and inclusive team based in Milan Fashion and design district
* Lots of opportunities to get involved in wellbeing initiatives to support your physical and mental health + monthly CSR/Team events
* …plus much More!

jobs.name: Embedded SW Engineer
jobs.description:

The ideal candidate is a graduate in Electronic Engineering or Computer Engineering / TLC and has at least 6 months of experience in software / firmware development.

* Experience in embedded firmware development

* Strong interpersonal skills
* High problem solving skills
* Ability to manage activities independently

jobs.name: JAVA Developer
jobs.description:
We are looking for resources that will deal with software development with Java technologies, both Back-End and Front-End.

**Positions require:**
